translated: Jesperson, Carl Jesper, municipal chief executive officer, Tidaholm, b. 17/11/07 in Gothenburg. Education: graduated from Gothenburg Higher Latin School in 1926, received a law degree from Lund University in 1934. Employment: served at Gothenburg City Legal Aid Institution from 1934 to 1936, assistant lawyer at Trollhättan Law Office from 1936 to 1939, secretary at Trollhättan City Council from 1936 to 1937, municipal chief executive officer in Tidaholm since 1939, police chief there from 1939 to 1942. Air raid warden in Tidaholm from 1939 to 1944, local defense division officer for Skaraborg County from 1942 to 1944, civilian defense director in Skaraborg County from 1944 to 1945, member of the crisis management board for Skaraborg County since 1939, member of the board for Skaraborg Savings Bank AB subsidiary in Tidaholm since 1941, chairman of the board for Tidaholm Housing Cooperative AB from 1942 to 1947, director of operations there since 1947, chairman of the rental board in Skaraborg County from 1942, chairman of the school board for lower secondary school in Tidaholm since 1947, member of the local heritage and archeological association in Tidaholm since 1943, guardian for Tidaholm City since 1946. Royal Order of the Seraphim with gold insignia.

hasOccupation.name: Chairman of the school board for lower secondary school
